Title: Establishes the office of the foster care ombudsman
Summary: Establishes the office of the foster care ombudsman to provide support to foster parents, biological parents, relatives, and youth in care.
LawCode: Add Art 19-G Title 3 Subtitle C §§524 - 524-i, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the office of the foster care ombudsman
